sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
makes a threat
, reče, da bo nekomu naredil nekaj slabega, zlasti kadar se tista oseba ne vede tako, kot bi želel.

seg.quote: We mustn't give in to threats.
Under threat of death, he confessed.

sense.def:
A threat
je vse, kar razumemo kot nevarno zase.

seg.quote: I was becoming a real threat to his plans.
